attributes.action: Scrap the proposals to allow MPs to hide their expenses from public review.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After loosing a court case, The house of commons are planning to enact a Statutary instrument to prevent freedom of information requests for MP's expenses. 

People who work in Business need to justify every penny they spend in expenses, why should it be different for those who hold power? 

The arguments fowarded so far appear to be silly. (They can be used by Terrorists indeed!, someone should be ashamed of themselves for that!), And as the government has so far, spent enough to pay for a small office of people in whitehall in failing to stop this through the courts, cost certainly cant be an issue.
